ygData.subject: General Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I have been playing EQ for about a year, and I feel that I have a pretty good grasp on what is going on.  I have a 32 wizard, a 27 warrior, 21 monk, 16
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I have been playing EQ for about a year, and I feel that I have a
pretty good grasp on what is going on. I have a 32 wizard, a 27
warrior, 21 monk, 16 cleric, and 10 shaman (probably 11 by the time
you guys respond to this). I just have a few questions.

1. When casting a spell, the spell type (evocation for nukes,
Conjuratoin for summoning, etc.) effects weather you fizzle or not,
for the most part and chanelling effects if your spell is inturpted
or resited, to a point. Right?

2. I know there are a lot of really good INT gear out there. But
what is some good shaman gear? I have gone to bazaar and bought him
a Spine Chill Spear (10:28 3agi 6wis 10svcold, i think) and a 3wis
ring, but what else could I get him.

3. Where can I go with my wizard? the level 32 one. I got board of
HK and I am floating around now just wondering where to go. I am
just porting and getting money atm, but i want to get to level 34 and
39 to get the rest of my port spells.

Thanks in advance.

Zephlarus (32 Wizard)
<Dragons Honor>

Tenolas (27 Warrior)
<Dragons Honor>

Ramaza (21 Monk)
<Dragons Honor>

Haradur (16 Cleric)
<Dragons Honor>

Fenelor (10 Shaman)
<Dragons Honor> (get the point ;)

Xegony Server
